import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import NavBar from '../components/NavBar'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Animated brand gradient background */}
{/* Hero */}

Track your expenses with confidence

Simple, fast and secure. Log transactions, visualize spending and stay on budget.

Log in Create account
{/* Layout with Sidebar + Dashboard area */}
{/* Stats / Dashboard cards */}

This month

Total income

); }; export default Home;
